3: The Corrupted here are getting stronger.
And there are some new ones as well...
The buildings on this side are severely damaged... Looks like a massive fight happened here before.
These are the marks of resistance from the people.
We'll leave the surveying and investigation to the Strike Hawk boy. Let's deal with the enemy in front first.
We don't know what it can do.
On it. Scanning Corrupted characteristics and running a profile comparison...
You people favor frontal engagement too much...
Very well then. I'll deal with the little ones, you folks can handle the big one.
Then we'll leave them to you, Watanabe.
